page.title: 06Interview: Post mistress
page.content:
LOCAL PEOPLE INTERVIEWED, JUNE 1985
Mrs. Pickard has been the Filleigh Post-mistress for 18 years. She sells sweets, cigarettes, groceries and stamps. She went to Filleigh School when she was young. In the playground they played hopscotch, rounders and tag. There were about 50 children. The names of the teachers were Miss Binding, Miss Brag, Miss Potter and Mrs. Jones. When she left school she worked in the school canteen. She did not enjoy this as she had to cook for about a hundred children and thought it was hard work. When she was young her hobby was knitting. During her holidays she did not go away but stayed at home.
